title: Beachfront Luxury Near Bucket-List Dubrovnik With Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinners & More
description: Picture yourself lounging on a Croatian beach with nothing but the Adriatic Sea out in front of you and all of the charms of ancient Dubrovnik within easy reach. Spend three nights staying on an untouched bay at the Admiral Grand Hotel - Slano and enjoy daily breakfast, nightly buffet dinners, a bottle of wine and spa discounts.

title: Bucket-List Beachfront Stay at One of the Leading Hotels of the World
description: Picture yourself relaxing on a Croatian beach with nothing but the sparkling waters of the Adriatic Sea out in front of you and all of the charms of ancient Dubrovnik within easy reach. All of this awaits at Sun Gardens Dubrovnik - a gorgeous beachfront resort part of The Leading Hotels of the World set in an idyllic location - where you will enjoy a complimentary upgrade to a stylish Deluxe Room, daily breakfast, a dinner during your stay, a bottle of wine and sweet treats on arrival and a 20% discount on spa treatments.

title: Croatia: Beachfront Luxury Near Bucket-List Dubrovnik
description: Picture yourself lounging on a Croatian beach with nothing but the Adriatic Sea out in front of you and all of the charms of ancient Dubrovnik within easy reach. Spend three nights staying on an untouched bay at the Admiral Grand Hotel - Slano and enjoy daily breakfast, nightly buffet dinners, a bottle of wine and spa discounts.

title: Heritage Five-Star Dubrovnik Boutique Break with Daily À La Carte Breakfast
description:
Explore the history, culture and natural beauty of Croatia with a stay at Hotel Kazbek, a former 16th-century summer palace lovingly restored into a sophisticated five-star boutique hotel. Perched on the coastline of Gruz Bay, sitting just a 10-minute drive from Dubrovnik’s Old Town, this sumptuous sanctuary is a jewel in the town’s crown, with walled gardens and heritage stone buildings offering the ultimate in privacy and peace.

Spend sun-soaked days by the outdoor pool and jacuzzi or settle in for a long lunch at the restaurant, soaking up summer rays in the courtyard. Take to the sea on the hotel’s private speedboat (charges apply), exploring the Lapad Peninsula and visiting nearby islands, or stay on land to explore the vast history of Dubrovnik’s Old Town. At the end of each day, refined rooms form the perfect refuge for relaxation, with elegant detailing and modern amenities.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights only):**

- Enjoy delicious **daily breakfast** at the restaurant
- Start the stay with a **gourmet welcome gift**
- Toast your stay with a **bottle of wine on arrival** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Sample the rich flavours of Croatian cuisine with **dinner for two at the restaurant**, once per stay (for stays of 4+ nights) 

**Suite Upgrade:** For more space, opt for the Suite, complete with a separate living area and large bedroom.

title: Dubrovnik Beachfront Paradise with Three Pools and Stunning Views of the Adriatic Coast
description: Escape to Sun Gardens Dubrovnik for an idyllic beachfront vacation with the sparkling waters of the Adriatic Sea your exquisite backdrop, and all of the charms of ancient Dubrovnik within easy reach. This slice of paradise is part of The Leading Hotels of the World, and boasts an abundance of entertainment options including poolside shows and beach events. You'll have a choice of amazing restaurants serving delectable Dalmation dishes, and access to three outdoor pools and an onsite spa.

title: Sophisticated Dubrovnik Cliffside Escape near Old Town with Three Restaurants, Two Pools & Luxe Spa
description:
Surrender to sun-drenched Croatian bliss at this five-star Rixos sanctuary, perfectly situated near historic Dubrovnik and overlooking the azure Adriatic Sea. With its modern architecture, stone accents and glass facades, the hotel blends effortlessly with the rugged Dalmatian coastline. Inside, unwind in sleek rooms, soak up panoramic sea views and enjoy world-class facilities.

Indulge in teppanyaki at Umi, Mediterranean flavours at Turquoise or fine dining at Libertas Fish Restaurant. Get lost in the buzzing atmosphere at the Sports Bar before dropping by the luxurious Anjana Spa with its Turkish hammam. Unwind by the indoor and outdoor pools, or venture further afield to Dubrovnik’s UNESCO Heritage Listed Old Town.

title: Luxury Five-Star Dubrovnik Seaside Hideaway
description:
Between the glittering waters of the Dalmatian Coast and the imposing cliffs you will find Villa Dubrovnik - a luxurious, five-star hotel that will immediately transport you away from reality and into a coastal paradise.

This seaside hub might be home to impressive baroque buildings, delightful culinary encounters, charming limestone streets, museums filled with artefacts and endless cultural experiences, but a blissful stay at this unequivocally stylish property will make you question if you should even step beyond the front doors. First-class hospitality and ultimate seclusion make it a haven for those seeking a moment of bliss, and the modern, minimalist design evokes a sense of tranquillity that perfectly complements the natural wonderland that surrounds the hotel. The indoor pool boasts views over Lokrum Island, and the beach is available for sun-lovers to recline on the rocky outcrop and dive into the emerald waters below. For those seeking exceptional culinary experiences, you'll find an elegant selection of Croatian and Mediterranean delights at the Michelin-recommended Restaurant Pjerin and Al Fresco Bar Giardino, showcasing the best regional fare in settings overlooking the water. This magnificent spot is the perfect place to momentarily escape the real world - and return feeling relaxed, refreshed and rejuvenated.
